CustomField.defaultValue: "User user = new User();" &BR()& "user.ProfileId = [SELECT Id FROM Profile WHERE Name = 'Standard User'].Id;" &BR()& "user.LastName = 'USERNAME';" &BR()& "user.Email = 'EMAIL';" &BR()& "user.Username = 'USERNAME';" &BR()& "user.Alias = 'nr';" &BR()& "user.TimeZoneSidKey = 'America/Los_Angeles';" &BR()& "user.EmailEncodingKey = 'UTF-8';" &BR()& "user.LanguageLocaleKey = 'en_US';" &BR()& "user.LocaleSidKey = 'en_US';" &BR()& "insert user;" &BR()& "System.resetPassword(user.Id, true);" &BR()& ""
CustomField.description: This Apex code will be executed when creating a User for an Environment. You can not only create the user, but assign profiles, permissionsets, licenses, and any other need.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This Apex code will be executed when creating a User for an Environment. You can not only create the user, but assign profiles, permissionsets, licenses, and any other need.
CustomField.label: Apex Code
